text:
Hey <@U01DQL7AMFH>, Thanks for reaching out to me.

The suggestion you've mentioned is not a case here. Like I'm getting the blog from next_blog/prev_blog default HubSpot variable. And there's no way to get the next blog/prev blog id.

Hello Everyone,

I created a HubDB named *Crusher Bucket ( 7-9T )*. Then I created a module named *ttp--product-specs*, where I can select a HubDB. My problem is I can't display the product values in the column. Here's my code: *code.png*

I want to display the values in a column. See *code-output.png*

So the value for the 1st row (Product Code) gets the value of the 2nd object in the image ( *code-output.png* ). The 2nd row (Suit Excavator Models) gets the value of the 3rd object... and so on.

I really appreciate your help guys.

Thanks,
Johanz
hmm you're right, for some reason they provide the featured image, slug and name, but no ID. Potentially you could request it and see if they add it in
